text: Aru Tai taikhan ke koise, “Jineka hoile bhi tumikhan Ami laga kup pora khabole ase, aru eneka baptizma lobole ase jineka baptizma pora Ami baptizma lobole ase: hoile bhi Ami laga dyna aru baya phale bohi bole to Ami dibole laga nohoi, hoile bhi etu taikhan ke dibole ase jun khan nimite Ami laga Pormeshwar Baba pora jaga bonai kene rakhise.”
